verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa-līlā bhāgavate kahe veda-vyāsa
caitanya-līlāra vyāsa--vṛndāvana-dāsa

synonyms: kṛṣṇa-līlā—the pastimes of Lord Kṛṣṇa; bhāgavate—in the book Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam; kahe—tells; veda-vyāsa—Vyāsadeva, the editor of the Vedic literature; caitanya-līlāra—of the pastimes of Lord Caitanya; vyāsa—compiler; vṛndāvana-dāsa—is Vṛndāvana dāsa.
translation: As Vyāsadeva has compiled all the pastimes of Lord Kṛṣṇa in Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam, Ṭhākura Vṛndāvana dāsa has depicted the pastimes of Lord Caitanya.
